column4: i used to be able to take a screenshot of a single window, using ctrl-prtscrn (or maybe it was alt).  it doesn't seem to be working after upgrade, i tried all the modifier keys.  only pressing prtscrn by itself takes a screenshot of the whole screen
i wonder if it has to do with enabling compiz
Do you have ccsm>Gnome Compatibility enabled? (and screenshot set inside of the plugin)
yeah, for some reason it just won't register the combo of alt-prtscrn.  i went into the gnome hotkey settings and remapped it to ctrl-prtscrn and it works fine now
